title: Central Bank of India nears deal for FEL's insurance stakes
description: Future Enterprises, undergoing insolvency proceedings, saw Central Bank of India emerge as the frontrunner to acquire its 25% and 33% stakes in two insurance ventures with Generali. The committee of creditors approved the bank's bid to enhance its insurance sector presence while Future Enterprises sought to settle its debt issues.
